purpose: To provide a framework for deploying and managing generative agents that can execute tasks onchain
principle: Built on blockchain technology to ensure decentralized execution and management of generative agents
reusability: Offers APIs and modular architecture for easy integration with blockchain applications
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for complex agent interactions and scalability issues
name: daydreams
description: Daydreams is a generative agent framework for executing anything onchain
highlight: Enables execution of generative agents directly on blockchain platforms
